title: Marriyum castigates Zalmay for tweet in Imran’s favour
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 22 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Wednesday strongly condemned Zalmay Khalilzad’s tweet in favour of Imran Khan.
“The origin of American conspiracy and the imported regime has come to light”, she said in a statement.
The minister said that the Jewish lobby had come forward to save its stooge and handlers of the criminal involved in foreign funding were coming to light.
She said the nexus of foreign funding was exposed now and it was also proved who was the foreign agent.She said that the foreign puppet had committed the worst human rights abuses during his four years rule as he had been labelled a media predator at the international level.
Marriyum Aurangzeb said the foreign stooge was responsible for the financial, political and diplomatic disaster in Pakistan.She alleged that international lobbyists had mobilized to create a civil war in Pakistan, and Zalmay’s tweet was a link to that plan.
